mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_ID, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id) WHERE d.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY delivery_date DESC

SELECT DELIVERY_ID, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, d.MEMBER_ID, p.product_name, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, m.member_name FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id) join member m ON(d.member_id = m.member_id) WHERE DELIVERY_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}+1 AND d.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT DELIVERY_ID, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, d.MEMBER_ID, p.product_name, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, m.member_name FROM FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id) join member m ON(d.member_id = m.member_id) WHERE delivery_id = #{deliveryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DELIVERY VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(DELIVERY_ID), 0) + 1 FROM DELIVERY), SYSDATE,'N',#{productId},#{memberId})
